description:
UPDATE: Registration Open (required - places going fast).  You will need to register your place here: - 

https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/sqlrelay-2017-bristol-registration-36994860624

Sessions Confirmed So Far: -

An Introduction to SQL Server & Containers Andrew Pruski

Enterprise Power BI Bent Nissen Pedersen

Continuous Delivery on the Azure Data Platform Gavin Campbell

Experts should work with facts, not guestimations – how you learn to love large scale SQL Server con Jani Savolainen

PowerBI your way to understand your SQL Server Estate Neil Hambly

Azure Data Lake - The Services. The SQL. The Sharp Paul Andrew

In-database Predictive Analytics with SQL Server 2017 Sacha Tomey

Modern Data Warehousing - A template for Lambda BI in Azure Simon Whiteley, Terry McCann

Build your first bot – no code required! Steph Locke

Real-Time Analytics: OLAP & OLTP in the mix! Stijn Wynants

DevOps 101 for the IT Pro Alex Yates, Rob Sewell

Database in the Cloud for Early Adopters Tobiasz Koprowski

For more details please here: https://www.sqlrelay.co.uk/
title: SQL Relay 2017: Bristol (October 2017)
